description:
A smallish RSS reader
Just like its namesake, Capy Reader is a small RSS reader focused on approachability and simplicity.

Some features include:

• Syncing via Feedbin, FreshRSS, or directly to your device
• Track read and starred articles
• Article search
• Headlines widget
• Notifications
• Full content mode
• Dark mode
• Big screen support
• Import and export your saved feeds
